attributes.action: Compensate those families that have invested their child trust fund vouchers into stakeholder trust funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most child trust fund providers only provide stakeholder trust funds. Stakeholder funds are based on stocks and shares and the value of the fund can rise as well as fall. Very few providers provide savings based funds

Due to the credit crunch and the current shambles the economy is in many of these funds have now lost money meaning the child has less money than when the fund was started.

We request the Government who are in charge of the country's economy compensate the affected children for the poor performance of these funds
